rows.field_155920: Need to decide how the beaches of Irongrass will transcend with or without the development of various characters.
This'll be the most abundant type of landscape throughout the book.
Redmaple's perceived peace and tranquility will be constantly juxtaposed, as ground-breaking events occur while characters are in Redmaple.

rows.field_195826: Great editor, but sometimes tricky to schedule sync time.
Pays very close attention to detail. Always catches all my mistakes.
Provides me with a different perspective I find useful in regards to my language.
